lyrics:
"MAjor" lyrics DJ Holiday & Gucci Mane Lyrics "MAjor" (feat. Wooh Da Kid) [Gucci Mane:] I stay fresh everyday, like a model at the Magic show I'm drinking out the bottle with two models at a fashion show Four niggas be like Gucci Mane, remember from a long time ago I smoked so much weed that I don't even have no time no more I got them stupid bands like five, six, seven, I can't even count no more No hopping out, no sporting no more, I'm hustling like I'm selling dope Niggas take me for a joke and shit but I find it hysterical I'm thirty? then I was like ten years ago Ten broads with me, they're fine you see, they know they cover Maybelline Catch your friend, it ain't a dream, It's Gucci Mane come join my team Uh oh, uh oh, no I'm not from Orlando I just got that magic stick, I'm balling like the pros do Is it my favor that I save her, independent grind so major Basketball players is neighbors Might of paid for it but there's nothing really major Independent balling like the majors, major Major, paper, ice game glacier Getting major paper, I be balling like the majors Major, basketball players is neighbors Politicians trade in favors [Wooh Da Kid:] Wooh Da Kid I do it big, everything is major Hello to the big leads, goodbye to my haters You can stack Louie shoes, imma' stack paper Similar to a fat boy, cause I'm caked up Wait, stop, baby just relax You don't need your car keys, my shofer handles that She's flexing like all this shit, just don't amaze her Never been a super hero so I cannot save her Bricksquad records, yeah we get dough Ink drops on the paper, made that money Grow It's feeling like the 90's, I'm getting dough For Gucci, I burn you and leave you dying [Gucci Mane:] Is it my favor that I save her, independent grind so major Basketball players is neighbors Might of paid for it but there's nothing really major Independent balling like the majors, major Major, paper, ice game glacier Getting major paper, I be balling like the majors Major, basketball players is neighbors Politicians trade in favors It's a flavor foul, every time I leave my house Iced out, bling blaw wow, slide you out And I don't love her, she don't love me, she drives me wild Chain out, take my car, cause she whining now It's Gucci time, Bricksquad, yeah my goons allowed And I'm noxious, I'm crazy, they so thugged out They got them choppers, them carbons, you riding bitch I'm getting dressed with Gatorade like I won the pennant On the pennant for the million, quarter million, half a million Whole ticket, whole ticket, gotta get it, gotta get it Like the real niggas did it when they did it, when they did it When I say that I serve my city like tenants Is it my favor that I save her, independent grind so major Basketball players is neighbors Might of paid for it but there's nothing really major Independent balling like the majors, major Major, paper, ice game glacier Getting major paper, I be balling like the majors Major, basketball players is neighbors Politicians trade in favors if (
